tool_description: Assigns permission sets to roles and manages the relationships between roles and their granted permissions.

role_id.description: Identifier of the role to assign permissions to

permission_set_ids.description: List of permission set identifiers to assign

assignment_type.description: Type of assignment: grant, revoke, replace

error_messages: Role not found: The specified role_id does not exist in the system.
Permission set not found: One or more permission_set_ids are invalid.
Invalid assignment type: Use one of [grant, revoke, replace].
Assignment conflict: Cannot assign conflicting permissions to the same role.
usage: Specify role_id and permission_set_ids to assign permissions to a role. Use assignment_type to control whether to grant, revoke, or replace existing permissions.

assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for this assignment operation
